snippet.title: Plants vs. Zombies 2 for iOS
snippet.description: Plants vs. Zombies 2 is a must-download, with new plants, new ways to play, new challenges, and a freemium model that doesn't get in your way.

snippet.title: 2015 Porsche Macan SUV
snippet.description: The 2015 Porsche Macan compact crossover makes a bow in LA with two turbocharged engine options and standard all-wheel drive.

snippet.title: Droplet smart sprinkler takes aim at your plants
snippet.description: The Droplet sprinkler takes accurate aim at individual plants and positions itself to be the Roomba of the watering world.

snippet.title: No green thumb needed for Click and Grow plants
snippet.description: Two new "plant cartridges" are added to the Click & Grow system. Built into each Chili Pepper and Mini Tomato cartridge are seeds, nutrients, and self-monitoring capabilities.

snippet.title: Listen to the sound of plants responding to the world
snippet.description: Artist Leslie Garcia has used transducers and amplifiers to translate the "language" of plants into sounds audible to the human ear.

snippet.title: Listen to the sound of plants responding to the world
Could bionic plants save our lives one day?
snippet.description: Cybernetic Venus flytrap anyone? MIT researchers create plants that are part machine, all awesome, and could one day even be turned into living gas detectors.

snippet.title: Vine plants video roots on Windows Phone
snippet.description: The 6-second video app Vine finally shows up in the Windows Phone app store and is available to download now.

snippet.title: Glow-in-the-dark plants could soon light up your home
snippet.description: Bioglow's autoluminescent plants will soon glow up for auction, giving the public their first chance to grab one of these living night-lights.

snippet.title: 2011 Porsche Cayenne S
snippet.description: The 2011 Porsche Cayenne S embodies much of Porsche's sport-driving DNA, while its cabin tech is generally excellent.
